name: react-generator
description: Command line folder-file generators for react projects

scripts.test-travis-ci-coveralls: ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover $npm_package_vars_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && npm run remove-coverage

author: Erwin Gaitan O <erwingaitano@gmail.com>
